Reviews.Content: stay socalled hotel nights february worst experience hotel dubai staff absolutely terrible worst seen trips world friend mine booked hotel trough travel agent money refundable stayed nights checkin process exhausting unbearably horrible receptionfront desk clerk seen rude miss opportunity feel terrible luck life course led checkin finished kept passport desk drawer unlike hotels uae scan passport immediately hand politely passport yelled afternoon receipt passport response smirk explained passport receipt police officer stops street frankly bad behavior yelled screaming repeated answer afternoon fifteen minutes arguing passport neither receipt escorted rude contents minibar main mission sign paper minibar content apparently steal minibar claim beginning ok appearance account formerly connecting door adjacent door walls thin listen couple adjacent love night nights horrible imagine yourself breakfast lunch try breakfast tried lunch day forgotten lady charge lunch day friend hotel guest pay 35 dirhams friend half joking told lady price lower considering quantity quality foods screamed dont else cheaper poof lunch basic quality desserts unbelievably low club lobby persian believe tell 150 dirhams person drinks included unheard believe dubai course laughed club club definitely friday saturday nights sleep easily club loud hear booms bangs staying 6th floor believe hotel iranian tours basically bring iranian tourists package deal change hotel feel pity people stay am picky person am professional traveler advice stay single night sleep park time funny cheap paid 400 dirhams night star stayed nicer money warned

Reviews.Content: located deira downtown locked buildings limited access hotel rated 4 opinion deserve 3 plus enter hotel lobby friendly staff check fast suite nice spacious bathroom filled class amenities night club hotel lot nigh ladies quiet breakfast recommend visit dubai try bur dubai hotels

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights staffs behavior friendly location hotels clean food opinion below average choices limited didnt tasty main negative hotel nightclub night girls lobby dont consider suitable families

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights okay free airport pick updrop service okay maybe upgrade enjoyed free internet food breakfast partner pool pretty bar overprized watch planes starting landing airport bit disappointed loud music bar location clock tower quick ride taxi shopping mall beach

Reviews.Title: “Most comfortable bed ever!”
Reviews.Author: Hardywanderers
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised reading negative reviews hotel stayed nights cruise night cruise phoned hotel home collected airport service provided free charge staff polite friendly happy answer questions visit etc spacious clean bed comfy bathroom shape returned cruise junior suite absolutely fantastic stuck tiny cabin week pity leave 400 am morning pool sit enjoy bit sunshine day cool drink staff helpful toowe returned aiport free charge time flight food eat hotel
